briefTitle: Self Selection Trial of Naproxen Sodium
officialTitle: A Pilot Self Selection Trial of an Extended-Release Over-the-Counter Analgesic

arms.label: Naproxen Sodium ER (BAYH6689) or Advil IR

summary: A pilot trial to demonstrate that consumers can appropriately select Aleve 24 Hour for their own use based on expected duration of pain greater than 12 hours.

primaryOutcome.measure: The Percentage of Participants Who Selected Naproxen Sodium ER and Expected Their Pain to Last More Than 12 Hours

effectByArm.arm: Naproxen Sodium ER (BAY H6689) or Advil IR
